name: wraith
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a spirit of a dead person, sometimes represented as a pale, transparent image of that person
something that is pale or weak and without a clear shape: He watched the misty wraiths of moisture making patterns on the window pane. Her wraith of a voice (= her weak voice) gave the songs a moving quality.
